Constructor Detail

Database

public Database(java.lang.String propsFile)
         throws ServerException
Constructs a new Database instance using the given file name to read the properties from.

Parameters:
propsFile - the name of the file containing the DB properties.
Throws:
ServerException - thrown whenever the DB cannot be constructed.

Database

public Database(java.lang.String propsFile,
                boolean init)
         throws ServerException
Constructs a new Database specifying whether this is a new instance or not.

Parameters:
propsFile - the name of the file containing the DB properties.
init - if set to true this is a new DB instance, so the catalog is generated, if set to false this is an old instance and the catalog is simply read from disk.
Throws:
ServerException - thrown whenever the DB cannot be constructed.
Method Detail

public Sink runStatement(java.lang.String statement)
                  throws EngineException
Executes the given statement.

Parameters:
statement - the statement to be executed.
Returns:
a Sink operator for result retrieval.
Throws:
EngineException - thrown whenever the statement cannot be executed.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
              throws ServerException
Shuts down the server.

Throws:
ServerException - thrown whenever the server cannot be shut down.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Start up the database.

Parameters:
args - the arguments to the server.
